Body:
template = Template(
    """x|index|reverse_index|first|last|cycle|even|odd
% for x in 'ham':
${x}|${loop.index}|${loop.reverse_index}|${loop.first}|${loop.last}|${loop.cycle('even', 'odd')}|${loop.even}|${loop.odd}
% endfor"""
    )
expected = ['x|index|reverse_index|first|last|cycle|even|odd',
    'h|0|2|True|False|even|True|False', 'a|1|1|False|False|odd|False|True',
    'm|2|0|False|True|even|True|False']
code = template.code
assert 'loop = __M_loop._enter(' in code, 'Generated a loop context since the loop variable was accessed'
rendered = template.render()
print(rendered)
for line in expected:
    assert line in rendered, 'Loop variables give information about the progress of the loop'
